subject: World Cup 2011 (Rugby)
lead_paragraph: The players and the coach for France may still be feuding, but they have found something that unites them: how few are giving them a chance against New Zealand in the Rugby World Cup final.
snippet: The players and the coach for France may still be feuding, but they have found something that unites them: how few are giving them a chance against New Zealand in the Rugby World Cup final.
